solution_line_template: Beth still needs to read {total_chapters} - {chapters_read} = <<{total_chapters}-{chapters_read}={remaining_chapters}>>{remaining_chapters} chapters.
She can read 1 chapter in {hours_spent}/{chapters_read_in_hours} = <<{hours_per_chapter}={hours_per_chapter}>>{hours_per_chapter} hours.

Therefore, she will be able to finish reading the remaining chapters in {hours_per_chapter} x {remaining_chapters} = <<{hours_per_chapter}*{remaining_chapters}={total_hours_to_finish}>>{total_hours_to_finish} hours.
